title: Python lab assignments
content:
For the python lab assignments (1st year),
1. Is it really necessary to write the explanation of  the code and make a proper flowchart for all the problems? 
2. If I only submit the code and output for all the problems, how much might I loose out of the 10 marks from lab that contribute to the sgpa?

Specifically, making flowcharts is such a pain

comments.body: Idk man my teacher told us to do make flowcharts only for week3 and 4. Explanation also he told to write until week6. Week7 programs he said no need
I see. So u didn't write flowcharts after week 4 and u wrote explanation only till week 6?
